title: Parent expertise in child development informs school practices
description: Parent expertise in child development informs school practices
content:
Scenario: Parent expertise in child development informs school practices
    Given Sarah has professional teaching expertise
    And she knows her children's developmental needs intimately
    When Sarah engages with children's schools
    Then her expertise should be recognized and valued
    And teachers should consult Sarah's knowledge of Tommy and Emma
    And parent-teacher relationships should be expert collaboration
    And Sarah's observations should inform educational planning
    And the system should position parents as expert partners
    And parent knowledge should shape school practices
